pkgmetadata.longdescription: RAMP database model===================This package contains the ORM model for the RAMP database.Set up of a PostgreSQL database-------------------------------1. create db directory and initialise the PostgreSQL database:: mkdir postgres_dbs initdb postgres_dbs2. start the PostgreSQL engine:: pg_ctl -D postgres_dbs -l postgres_dbs/logfile start3. create a user `<db_user>` and set a password `<db_password>`:: createuser --pwprompt <db_user>4. create the database called `<db_name>` for that user:: createdb --owner=<db_user> <db_name>
